price: 10. (Xus) markuu Rabbigaa u yeedhay Muuse (Isagoo leh): U tag qoloda daalimiinta ah (gar ma qaatayaasha).
arabic: وَإِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبُّكَ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱئۡتِ ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh nādā rabbuka mūsā ani i'ti al-qawma al-ẓālimīna
